1. Not more than one (1) Accessory Dwelling shall be permitted on any lot of record as
accessory to a Single Family Dwelling, Manufactured Home, or Modular Home.
2. The Accessory Dwelling contains not more that fifty percent (50%) of the square
footage of the Single Family Dwelling, Manufactured Home, or Modular Home.
3. The Accessory Dwelling shall meet the same zoning district dimensional
requirements applicable to the district in which the property is located, as shown in
Table 5.2 Zoning District Dimensional Requirements.
Section 6.3.12 Adult Care Homes
Adult Care Homes must not be located within a one-half (0.5) mile radius of an existing
Adult Care Home, except for Family Care Homes.
